state: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First off, go to the north. After that, go east. And then, make an effort to travel north. With that over with, try to move north. Once you succeed at that, travel west. Then, venture south. Then, make an effort to venture west. That done, make an effort to head south. After that, try to travel south. After that, go west. Then, try to move north. After that, venture west. Then, travel north. And then, pick up the laptop from the recliner inside the chamber. Got that? Good! -= Laundromat =- You arrive in a laundromat. A typical kind of place. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Laundromat =-0/1
